name: Secret Archives
description:
This is a third person shooting and mild decryption game, with the main plot of a secret experiment being conducted somewhere in the future
During this process, a unique mineral was discovered and caused a large-scale infection
The situation is out of control, all non infected individuals are evacuated
And the protagonist's task is to retrieve important 'files' and escape from this place!


There are three weapons in the game, namely pistol, rifle, and shotgun
Possessing two types of auxiliary weapons simultaneously, namely self-defense daggers and grenades
There is also a synthetic ammunition system in the game, where players can synthesize the ammunition they want according to their preferences


The game adopts a box court style map, where players need to explore areas, search for lines to solve puzzles, defeat enemies, and escape from this place!


there are various styles of clothes and photo taking actions scattered on the map. Once unlocked, you can go to the photo taking mode to play!


The game has added custom body shape options, whether you like plump or slim ones, you can find them here!
